A: 1. Peaceful Co-existence means different people living together in _ (a) conflict (b) peace (c) war (d) isolation
2. When people live together without disagreement or fight, there is peaceful _ (a) conflict (b) co-existence (c) separation (d) argument
3. Jesus taught us to live _ with others (a) argumentatively (b) peacefully (c) selfishly (d) distantly
4. If somebody offends us, Jesus advised us to _ the person (a) fight (b) ignore (c) forgive (d) blame
5. God wants us to live peacefully with others in the _ (a) wilderness (b) community (c) mountains (d) solitude
6. Which of these pairs reconciled after one took the blessings of the other? (a) Abraham and Lot (b) Jonathan and David (c) Esau and Jacob (d) Philemon and Onesimus
7. Abraham prevented a quarrel between himself and his nephew, _ (a) Isaac (b) Esau (c) Jacob (d) Lot

8. Who are mentioned as examples of people desiring peaceful co-existence in the bible, besides Esau and Jacob, Isaac and Abimelech, and Abraham and Lot? (a) Saul and David (b) Philemon and Onesimus (c) Moses and Aaron (d) Peter and John
9. Peaceful co-existence is when people live together without any _ (a) agreement (b) fight (c) love (d) understanding
10. The Bible provides good examples of people who lived happily together to prevent _ (a) joy (b) disagreement (c) peace (d) unity
11. Jesus wants us to show love and _ to people (a) hatred (b) indifference (c) hospitality (d) pride
12. We should tell people the _ and be open-minded to them (a) lies (b) truth (c) secrets (d) stories
13. Which two people in the bible showed unselfish love to each other? (a) Moses and Aaron (b) Cain and Abel (c) Jonathan and David (d) Peter and Paul
14. Jonathan loved David as his own _ (a) brother (b) friend (c) soul (d) king
15. Who was Jonathan's father? (a) David (b) Saul (c) Samuel (d) Jesse
16. Jonathan saved David by telling him King Saul's plans to _ (a) promote him (b) kill him (c) bless him (d) reward him
17. Jonathan and David made a _ because they loved each other so much (a) promise (b) covenant (c) agreement (d) deal
18. Pupils and everybody in society should show _ to one another (a) fear (b) anger (c) love (d) jealousy
19. We should show love to those in danger and give help to the _ (a) rich (b) powerful (c) needy (d) strong
20. One way to show love is to share our _ with others (a) problems (b) belongings (c) secrets (d) thoughts
